PARAGRAPH.STRING: is an Austrian mountain, between Stubaital and Wipptal in Tyrol, Austria.
nickname is Altar von Tirol, literally the Altar of Tyrol.

* from Matrei am Brenner/ Wipptal via Maria Waldrast* from Fulpmes/ Stubaital via Medraz/ Fulpmes, via Wildeben- Alm (also accessible by Mountainbike ) via Serlesjöchl * from Kampl/Neustift, via Wildeben- Alm, via Serlesjöchl
